description: This requirement is open only to those TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the following categories: C.15. Computer Forensics Specialist – Level 3 Security Requirement: Common PS SRCL #19 applies Minimum Resource Security Required: Secret Set-aside under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business Voluntarily Set-aside.
full_summary:
# NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP)

## General Information
* Title: TBIPS (Technology, Business Innovation and Procurement Services)
* Reference Number: cb-8615-5163528
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: 2024-00048
* Publication Date: August 30, 2023
* Closing Date: September 15, 2023 2:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: October 2, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: September 30, 2026

## Notice Type and Status
* Notice Type: Procurement Notice
* Tender Status: Expiring

## Goods and Services
* Goods and Services Classification System (G/GC): 80101507
* UNSPSC Code: Information Technology Consultation Services
* Procurement Category: SRV (Services)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Selective Tendering

## Evaluation Criteria
* The selection criteria for this procurement are based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Contracting Entity
* Name: Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
* Address: 59 Camelot Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0Y9, Canada

## Contact Information
* Name: Ashley Bennett
* Email: Ashley.Bennett@inspection.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 553-9512

## Description of the Requirements
This procurement is for information technology consultation services. The requirement is open only to those TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region.

## Schedule and Milestones
* Contract Start Date: October 2, 2023
* Contract End Date: September 30, 2026

## Trade Agreements and Certifications
This procurement is subject to various trade agreements and certifications, including the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and others.

## Languages
English and French are the official languages of this procurement. All documents related to this procurement are available in both languages.

## Download Documents
[Attachment URL] - TBIPS NPP Template (English)
[Attachment URL] - TBIPS NPP Template (French)
